article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for C Common Libraries

abstract.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating C Common Libraries from from GT4.2
section.para: No changes need to be made in applications using version 4.0.x releases of the C common libraries.

section.title: Migrating C Common Libraries from from GT4.0
section.para: No changes need to be made in applications using version 4.0.x releases of the C common libraries.

section.title: Migrating C Common Libraries from from GT3
section.para: No changes need to be made in applications using version 3.x releases of the C common libraries.

section.title: Migrating C Common Libraries from GT2
section.para: No changes need to be made in applications using version 2.x releases of the C common libraries.
